ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)
ygData.msgSnippet: (crap effect) The effect on the helm can be VERY usefull when grouped with a cretin class. Mu ... From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@eds.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
"(crap effect)"

The effect on the helm can be VERY usefull when grouped with a cretin class.


Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
Sent: Monday, July 23, 2001 11:12 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)


the claw is very nice. i still use a icetooths claw which is almost the same
damagewise. icepaw war claw also weights 0.0

the crown is a very good bard item imo. far better than ss helm (crap
effect). int doesnt really matter, since when you get the crown you will
have your non-combat skills maxed and combat skills use dex (i think) for
skill increases. i had very good cc-performance with it, but the effekt of
CHA is still debated. however...

for weaps i also got a sainy's claw recently in CoM. stats are 6/19 int3
ac10 piercing. what do you think of it? i could use better damaging weapons
but i like the 10ac, and the 3 int helps to offset the neg 30 int from the
crown =P. the look is also nice.

tobi

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Gesendet am: Montag, 23. Juli 2001 08:00
An: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Betreff: RE: AW: [eqbards] Katanas

I just got a "Icepaw war claw" this weekend in Velektors. If you like the
freddy kruger look . They are not that bad... 9/24 +3AGI Primary only (could
have been fun to dual wield)

I also got the Kobold Jesters Crown (ac15 cha30 agi5 int-30 dex-5 wt0.0) Not
the perfect item for skill increases, but I think I will use it when
charming. Besides it dont weigh anything, so its "free" to drag around.

Both items dropped in the village. The Crown of a named. and the claws of a
normal kobold I think

Musiker, Bertox
